name: Siege Dungeon
description:
Siege Dungeon is a Rouge Like Puzzle game where you design the dungeon while it is being attacked by pesky heroes. 

You add rooms, rotate them by mix and matching them into place. 

Adventurers are after your gold, however your trusty minion will move the gold chest to each new room . So keep adding rooms to keep it safe. 

Some rooms have special spawners where Skeletons, Bugs and Demons are created which will help defend your dungeon. So placing these rooms strategically is very important.

Hope you enjoy the game, this game was created for the Game Plus Jam 2022
